title: FS: Joe Kelley T206 HOFer SGC 30-SOLD!
author: AndyG09

posts.post_title: FS: Joe Kelley T206 HOFer SGC 30-SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Hello, friends. I would like to sell this T206 Joe Kelley. It has been graded a 30 by the nice folks in Parsippany. As you can see, it has very fine eye appeal, and is nice for its technical grade (apologies for weak pics).  I am asking SOLD shipped. PP Payment Owed/Gift please. Thank you very much for looking.

Andy
